properties.name: og:title
properties.content: A Decentralized Gaming Ecosystem Made By Players

properties.name: og:description
properties.content: The Sandbox is a decentralized community-driven gaming ecosystem for creators to monetize voxel assets and gaming experiences in the blockchain!

itemprops.name: description
itemprops.content: The Sandbox is a decentralized community-driven gaming ecosystem for creators to monetize voxel assets and gaming experiences in the blockchain!

twitters.name: twitter:title
twitters.content: A Decentralized Gaming Ecosystem Made By Players.

twitters.name: twitter:description
twitters.content: The Sandbox is a decentralized community-driven gaming ecosystem for creators to monetize voxel assets and gaming experiences in the blockchain!

twitters.name: twitter:card
twitters.content: A Decentralized Gaming Ecosystem Made By Players.

banner.subtitle: The Sandbox offers a unique way to create, assemble and share 3D voxel models. We empower Creators with intuitive, powerful content creation tools. You can make your own 3D voxel objects, animate them, and publish/sell them in our worldwide marketplace, for free!

one.content: Animate your characters and see your voxel models come to life in your own crafted universe! Let players explore your creations in a brand new way!

two.content: Create assets in your favorite voxel editor, and export them into The Sandbox to create new universes. Share your work for free or monetize each asset: The choice is yours!

monetize.content: You can make your own 3D voxel objects, animate them, and publish/sell them in our worldwide marketplace, for free! See your creations come to life in gaming experiences while you get paid!

step.title: 4 easy steps to creation
step.text: The Sandbox is made by gamers, for gamers. The power of the platform, combined with an open asset market, allows artists to share and sell their content as we together build one of the largest online voxel communities

items.title: create
items.description: Create your assets within your favorite voxel editor, and export them into The Sandbox

items.title: Assemble
items.description: Assemble your own world without restrictions on canvas size!

items.title: share
items.description: Share your creations and assets and watch the community bring them to life!

items.title: play
items.description: The Sandbox allows players to create, share and discover new worlds everyday!
